# getWidgets

Gets widgets.

```
GET /widgets
  ?q={query}
--- 200 OK
{
  "widgets": [ { "id": ... }, ... ]
}
```

| request | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| query | string | The query. |

| response | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| widgets | [Widget](Widget.md)[] | The widgets. |
